Daryl del Rosario - AVP (''in absentia'') }} {{University debating}} The '''Ateneo Debate Society''', commonly referred to as the '''ADS''', is the student-run [[debate|debating]] society of the [[Ateneo de Manila University]] in [[Quezon City]], [[Metro Manila]], [[Philippines]]. The society, founded in 1991, is regarded as one of Asia's most awarded debating institutions, having won several tournaments both within and outside the Philippines. It is also currently ranked among the top ten debate societies in the world. ==External links== *[http://ateneodebatesociety.webs.com/ Ateneo Debate Society] {{speech-and-debate-stub}} [[Category:Student debating societies]] [[Category:Organizations established in 1991]]
